name: Danganronpa: Gods at Gunpoint Demo Prologue
name_original: Danganronpa: Gods at Gunpoint Demo Prologue
description: A Demo Build for the Prologue of my Danganronpa Fangame, Gods at Gunpoint! Has many placeholder backgrounds/non-finalized dialogue which will be updated for the full version, stay tuned! Follow the development at https://www.instagram.com/godsatgunpoint/ !
